newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia late rubber stable on short-covering.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia late rubber stable on short-covering.

text.p: Indonesian tyre-grade SIR20 offer prices were stable in late trading on Tuesday following short-covering mostly by Singaporean firms, dealers said.
Dealers said February SIR20 offer prices were stable at 54.75-55.25 cents/lb fob Medan, 54.50-55.00 fob Surabaya, Padang and Palembang, 54.00-54.50 fob Pontianak and Jambi.
"The overall market sentiment remained soft despite some short-covering," one Jakarta dealer said.
The dealer said Singaporean firms bought February SIR20 at 54.25 cents/lb fob Palembang in late trading.
January SIR3CV fob Medan was on offer at 142 cents/kg, up from the previous 141, they said.
Latex dealers said high amoniac latex was on offer at 2,230 rupiah/kg fob Medan for January shipments.
